Contraceptive Counselling 
• Counselling is a powerful tool to give accurate information, address misconceptions and concerns and provide
skills to negotiate safe sexual practices.
• It must be provided in a non-judgmental and respectful manner allowing the patient to make an informed
choice.
• There ar e many approaches to counselling.
o There should never be any coercion when counselling and providing contraception.
